comment: Battery is not good.  Its takes long time to charge..
Amazing screen length and audio. Camera works good for me. Brilliant auto sensors. Within the price range.

THE PRODUCT IS NOT USER FRIENDLY, THERE ARE SO MANY UNNECESSARY APPLICATIONS R AUTOMATICALLY STORING. THE MESSAGE SECTION OPERATION IS VERY BAD AND NOT USER FRIENDLY. IF U WANT DELETE ANY APPIT WILL GO TO GOOGLE ICON ALSO TIME CONSUMING FOR DELETION. NOT AT ALL A USER FRIENDLY OPERATION.FURTHER THE BATTERY WILL TAKE 5 TO 6 HOURS  FOR  FULL CHARGE AND GET VERY HOT AFTER 3 HRS PLUGGING . VERY DIFFICULT OPERATION FOR PHONE CLONING. NOT WORTH FOR MONEY..
Very  nice  mobile and very  beautiful I am asking  one question  don't  mistake  me in case I am returning  the  mobile  the same  mobile  at the  rate  of 7990 / -r u giving  please  tell  me
My mobile in not work sim

1. nice display2. decent speed , actually i cant compare coz my other phone is a one plus 7t3. decent camera4. its for my 75 year old mom so i guess its good enough5. and yes the blue color is lovelygo for it if you want a trouble free phone for old people

Battery charging is very very slow. It is taking 1 hour to charge 20% battery. So effectively it is taking 5 hours for full charge.If you are thinking to purchase it then please drop your idea.Very disappointed.
Nice phone . Built quality is good.  Comes with fast processer and amoled display  Value for moneyIn box content - back cover , charger , warranty card and mobile phone
